{{also|computer|compùter}} ==German== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|en|computer}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/kɔmˈpjuːtɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Computer.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Computers|Computer}} # [[computer]] {{gloss|programmable electronic device that performs mathematical calculations, logical operations, and usually also data retrieval/storage}} #: {{syn|de|Rechner}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|s}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de|Computeranimation|computeranimiert|computergesteuert|Computerindustrie|Computerlinguistik|Computerprogramm|Computerspiel|Computertomographie|Heimcomputer|Quantencomputer}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|PC}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{der|lb|en|computer}}, partly through {{der|lb|de|Computer}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/komˈpjuːteʀ/|[komˈpjuːtɐ]}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|m}} # [[computer]] [[Category:lb:Computing]]
